author: CTPPS
body:
- Code unified to use one single numbering scheme based on the DetId class. The old "decimal" ids were only kept as keys of `TotemRPUVPattern` and `TotemRPLocalTrack` in order to maintain back-ward compatibility.
- The code common to all RP classes was factorised into class `CTPPSDetId`.
- Added class `CTPPSDiamondDetId` for the diamond timing detectors.
title: CTPPS: detector id update
